pkgmetadata.longdescription: Event-related potentials (ERP) analysis, graphics and utility functions // This package is dedicated to the analysis of event-related potentials (ERPs). Event-related potentials are the measured brain responses associated with a specific sensory, cognitive, or motor event and are obtained from electroencephalographic (EEG) signal. The erpR package contains a series of functions for importing ERP data, computing traditional ERP measures, exploratory ERP analyses and plotting.
